name: MaketheWorldaBetterPlace
0:
”Alexa, open Make the World a Better Place”
”Alexa, launch Make the World a Better Place”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: make the world a better place
des:
This skill will give you ideas that you can easily do to make a difference in your life, the lives of those around you, and the whole world. Come back again and again for new ideas to help inspire you. Every idea is easy to do, and makes an impact. Together, all of us can change the world. 

Just say, "Alexa, launch Make the World A Better Place" and follow the prompts.
